transcript: I don't know why it is. I don't know. I'm trying to reach out for something. I have to pull back because I'm afraid it's gonna hurt somebody all my life.

segments.text: I don't know why it is. I don't know. I'm trying to reach out for something. I have to pull back because I'm afraid it's gonna hurt somebody all my life.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know why it is you know every time I reach out for something I have to pull back 'cause I'm afraid it's going to hurt somebody.  All my life...
